<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Superior Bond](/Feats.aspx?ID=5047) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[arcane bond](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use. You can use Drain Bonded Item one additional time per day, but only to cast a spell 2 or more ranks lower than your highest-rank wizard spell slot.
